      Allocates PEs for a VM.
      Parameters:

      mipsShare - the mips share
      Returns:

      public List<Double> getAllocatedMipsForContainer(Container container)
      Returns the MIPS share of each Pe that is allocated to a given VM.
      Parameters:
      container - the container
      Returns:
      an array containing the amount of MIPS of each pe that is available to the VM

      $none

      $none
